sourcesContent:
// src/styles/theme.js
import { keyframes } from 'styled-components'; // Import keyframes if you define them here

// Define any global keyframes here if you want them in the theme object
const gradientBackground = keyframes`
  0% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
  50% { background-position: 100% 50%; }
  100% { background-position: 0% 50%; }
`;

const theme = {
  colors: {
    primary: '#6a0dad',           // Deep Purple
    primaryLight: '#9370db',      // Medium Purple
    primaryAccent: '#8a2be2',     // Blue Violet (for hover/accent)
    primaryDark: '#4a007f',       // Darker purple
    secondary: '#ff69b4',         // Hot Pink
    secondaryLight: '#ffb6c1',    // Light Pink
    secondaryDark: '#cc4f8a',     // Darker pink
    info: '#00ced1',              // Dark Turquoise (for highlights/borders)
    success: '#32cd32',           // Lime Green
    warning: '#ffd700',           // Gold
    danger: '#ff4500',            // Orange Red

    background: '#1a1a2e',        // Dark Blue Background
    backgroundDark: '#0f0f1c',    // Even Darker Blue for depth
    dark: '#0f0f1c',              // For cards/sections
    light: '#f0f0f0',             // Lightest color for certain backgrounds

    text: '#e0e0e0',              // Light Gray text
    textLight: '#ffffff',         // White text
    textSecondary: '#a0a0a0',     // Muted text for subtle elements
    border: '#4a4a6b',            // Muted border color

    focus: '#007bff',             // Focus outline color
    active: '#0056b3',            // Active state color

    // Gradients for buttons/borders
    gradientPrimary: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #6a0dad 0%, #8a2be2 100%)',
    gradientSecondary: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #ff69b4 0%, #ffb6c1 100%)',
    gradientVibrant: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #6a0dad, #ff69b4, #00ced1)', // A more vibrant multi-stop gradient
  },
  spacing: {
    xxs: '4px',
    xs: '8px',
    sm: '12px',
    md: '16px',
    lg: '24px',
    xl: '32px',
    xxl: '48px',
    xxxl: '64px',
  },
  fonts: {
    main: 'Roboto, sans-serif',    // General body font
    heading: 'Montserrat, sans-serif', // Headings font
    display: 'Oswald, sans-serif', // For very large titles/display text
  },
  breakpoints: {
    mobile: '576px',
    tablet: '768px',
    desktop: '992px',
    lg: '1200px', // Added for larger breakpoints
  },
  shadows: {
    sm: '0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.12), 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.24)',
    md: '0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.16), 0 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.23)',
    lg: '0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.19), 0 6px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.23)',
    xl: '0 14px 28px rgba(0,0,0,0.25), 0 10px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.22)',
    xxl: '0 19px 38px rgba(0,0,0,0.3), 0 15px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.22)',
    inset: 'inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)',
  },
  borderRadius: {
    sm: '4px',
    md: '8px',
    lg: '12px',
    xl: '20px',
    full: '9999px', // For perfect circles/pills
  },
  transitions: {
    fast: '0.15s',
    normal: '0.3s',
    slow: '0.5s',
    ease: 'ease',
    easeIn: 'ease-in',
    easeOut: 'ease-out',
    easeInOut: 'ease-in-out',
    // Custom cubic-bezier for more grand/smooth animations
    easeOutQuint: 'cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1)',
  },
  animations: {
    fadeInDuration: '0.8s',
    slideInDuration: '1s',
    blobDanceDuration: '30s', // Consistent duration for blobs
    gradientCycleDuration: '25s', // Consistent duration for gradient background
    delaySm: '0.1s',
    delayMd: '0.2s',
    delayLg: '0.4s',
    // Now defining keyframes here as well for centralized access
    gradientBackground: gradientBackground, // Exporting the keyframe object
  },
  zIndex: {
    base: 100,
    dropdown: 1000,
    sticky: 1100,
    modal: 1200,
    overlay: 1300,
    loader: 1400,
  },
};

export default theme;
